abstract: Moving Jimmy Kimmel up means moving “Nightline” back a full hour, past midnight — a fate ABC’s news division has long been trying to avoid.
snippet: Moving Jimmy Kimmel up means moving “Nightline” back a full hour, past midnight — a fate ABC’s news division has long been trying to avoid.
lead_paragraph: With Jimmy Kimmel moving to 11:35 p.m. in January, the famed ABC News program “Nightline” will be moving back a full hour to 12:35 a.m. It is a deeply disappointing outcome for many at the news division, which had fought hard to keep the pre-midnight time slot.

headline.main: Jimmy Kimmel’s Gain Is Felt as a Loss at ‘Nightline’
